choices: It was Misty, looking for a new Water Pokemon

1.content:
Alarms blared, as the youth ran away from the lab doors. He didn't have much time before the guards came after him. Clutching the bag of candies in his hand, he made off for the exit.

From what he understood, these candies could make anyone - Pokemon or human - exponentially stronger. That's why he was stealing them: to keep them out of the wrong hands.

He heard footsteps behind him, and ran faster. Turning a corner, he dived into an open closet and quickly shut the door. He wasn't going to be able to easily escape with the candies.

He pulled out a small device resembling a tablet. Setting the candies on it, he inputted some coordinates, and watched as the candies vanished in a bright flash. The flash shown through the door, alerting a pair of guards, who quickly closed in on the youth.

The teleporter had sent the candies to a safe place, but someone just happened to be at that place...
1.title: It Begins

12.content: May was going to a Contest with her Pokemon, when a bright flash appeared in front of her. "What the heck was that??!" she said out loud. When the light dimmed, she saw a bag full of candy . Feeling a bit hungry, she ate....
12.title: It was May, heading to another contest.

125.content:
She ate the whole bag! When she was finished, the bag was full? Then, she started to shake and started to grow! She grew a 4 pack, then a 6 pack, 8 pack, 12, 16, 20, then up to 24! Her former wimpy arms become 15 feet big, while her boobs ripped though her clothes, but not her underwear to a HH-cup! Her height was now 100 feet tall! "I Love this!" She screamed to the whole world

Then she heard a familiar voice "MAY! Is That you?!?" She turned and saw.....

1251.content:
The towering form of May slowly turned around, and, with some difficulty given her monumental jugs, she saw Ash, who was looking up at him. She gave a smirk and flexed her muscles, watching Ash's jaw drop to the floor as her already insanely bulbous muscles pushed out even further.

"The one and only! How you doing Ashy?"

"Uhm.... G-Good! But holy crap....." Ash scratched the back of his head and crossed his legs, trying to hide his sudden "interest" with May. "How'd you get so big?!"

May held up the bag of rare candies, giggling. "Here's what helped me juice up! These rare candies pack quite a punch, Ashy."

She then got an idea, a mischievous smirk spreading across her face.

"Hey Ashy, how would you like some?"

The raven haired trainer's eyes widened as he looked at the bag. "Uhm, really? Well.... Let's see....."

How many candies does he eat?

13.content:
Dawn yawned to herself as she was walking through the woods, taking a quick shortcut that she knew to the mall. However, before she could make it any further, a large beam of light blasted itself in front of her, causing a small crater in the ground.

"Holy! What the heck?! Wait a minute.... Are these.... candies?"

The blue haired woman peered into the crater and gazed at the shiny blue candies, sitting in a bag. Slowly, she reached out and picked the bag up, looking at all bright, glistening candies.

"Ooh, these look tasty... I mean, yeah, it's a bit odd for them to just fall from the sky like that, but hey, I've seen weirder. Down the hatch!"

Dawn eats.....
13.title: It was Dawn, heading to the mall.

choices: Inside the mall, her friends are waiting for her
Dawn decides to use more candies
131.content:
Dawn was admittedly curious about the candies. For all intents and purposes, these were just rare candies, like those used to power up Pokemon. There was no visible effect on humans. However, the candies in her hand were... different, somehow.

It was difficult to explain, but the wrapping was slightly off and Dawn had this strange feeling. As if her instincts made her naturally suspicious.

But then again, what was the harm? Besides, she was incredibly hungry after having skipped breakfast. Best to eat now. Dawn hated having an empty stomach, and the others were waiting for her inside the mall so it would take too long to buy something else.

The Pokemon coordinator shrugged as she took five candies out of the large bag, noticing that she'd hardly made a dent in her new supply. As she munched on the treats, Dawn was surprised by the taste; sweet but also refreshing.

"Maybe I should give some to Ash too." Dawn mused to herself as she downed the last candy, "He's a fan of sweets like these. Oh, and my Pokemon too!"

But before she could continue on her way, Dawn stopped in her tracks, feeling a strange but warm sensation spread through her entire being. The heat was so sudden. The bluenette was initially confused, but then her eyes widened in shock as she looked down at herself.

She was growing muscular! And fast, too!

Dawn could only watch as her muscles expanded, becoming bigger and firmer. Her arms packed on muscle mass rapidly -- it startled her! Biceps that had previously been unremarkable were quickly gaining several inches. In only a matter of seconds, they were the size of grapefruits; probably around 15 inches or so. Her triceps grew in tandem, becoming sturdier, and her forearms grew thick with knotted muscle fibers. Small veins snaked their way underneath her skin to meet the muscle.

A moan escaped her as the warm sensation began to affect her. Meanwhile, the growth caused her legs to not only become thicker and more defined, but also grow longer. Deep grooves appeared between the muscle groups, and her vastus muscles for instance were now displaying noticeable teardrop shapes. Further down below, her calves resembled those of a trained athlete. Hell, she could give them a run for their money, but with these legs she might just outrun them in the process!

"Oh! This feels so... good!" Dawn gasped loudly. Her breathing was heavier, and somehow her voice was a bit deeper too; more husky. Maybe it had to do with her chest that was expanding, "I..."*gasp*"I want more!"

The young Pokemon trainer moaned, feeling her chest and back become wider, forcing her clothes to accommodate -- albeit barely. More definition was added to her firm pectorals, which were now quite developed. A nice split ran in between, somewhat like a muscle cleavage for a lack of better terms. The same could be said for her abdominals. Dawn had never worried about looking fat or anything, but now any fat remaining on her belly was turned into solid muscle. A proud six-pack tensed with every movement she made.

Dawn giggled as she put her hands on her butt, feeling it grow underneath her fingers, "Oh, yes! Keeping going!"

Her buns were getting hard, but not overly so. More importantly, her glutes grew rounder which meant that she'd be rocking one hell of a muscle booty. The movement she made with her arms, however, caused her striated back to flex. The muscle fibers there hadn't been left behind. Dawn's traps were nothing to laugh at either. Her lats were flaring out as the fibers within grew denser and more numerous.

By the time the growth was over, Dawn was so happy she could almost squeal. The transformation was amazing! Not only did she love the result, but it had filled her with such raw energy, it was almost addictive.

"Wow! I grew a lot, didn't I?" Dawn smiled at her own reflection in a nearby pond, observing her new muscles with a critical gaze. She flexed her bicep, and was thrilled to see a firm, round ball of a muscle pop up, "I look like those girls who love working out, or training with fight-type Pokemon. Actually, I think I might be even a bit bigger."

She wasn't just bigger in the sense that she looked like an amateur bodybuilder, though. Dawn had grown taller too. If she had to guess, she was six feet tall, or at least close.

And to top things off, her breasts had grown a bit larger as well! Dawn giggled as she gazed down her firm pectorals, noticing that her shirt was very tight around the chest area, seeing as they struggled to hold her boobs. Honestly, with the way her bra was obviously too small, they had to be a double D.

It was a good thing that there were no sleeves on her shirt, because she doubted they would have held her compact biceps and sinewy forearms, or her striated deltoids. Oh, and pants too. Dawn was glad she preferred skirts, since anything else would have been torn apart by her wide thighs.

"Though, I can't help but wonder how strong I've gotten. Muscles like these aren't just for show, right?" Dawn muttered to no one in particular. After all, this was a secluded area.

The blue-haired teen looked around a bit, eager to test herself. Her gaze landed on a large log. Dawn knew she wouldn't have been able to lift something as heavy as that on her own, but her new physique had certainly boosted her confidence, and the bluenette was sure her strength had increased too.

She walked over to the piece of wood and crouched, hamstrings tensing before she placed both of her hands on the log. Dawn took a deep breath, and then began to lift. To her surprise -- and joy -- she discovered that despite being larger and heavier than her, the log was easy to pick up, which had to mean her strength was impressive.

The coordinator laughed out loud as she held the log over her head. Sure, there was some strain and it wasn't as if it weighed nothing, but this was a stark contrast to her previous state.

Dawn slowly squatted, using the log as a barbell as she put it on her shoulders. While her form was sloppy, as any professional gymgoer would say, the exercise did help her try out her legs. Yet again, her new muscles worked out great; she could squat easily despite having a large log on her shoulders.

However, she was going to need new clothes. Her shirt was holding on -- thank Arceus for small mercies -- but the skirt wasn't faring well, considering her large glutes kept showing whenever she did a full squat, bulging and pushing away her skirt.

"These candies definitely made me a lot stronger. I could do a whole workout like this!" Dawn smiled brightly, pushing the log up and down, muscles flexing and tightening with each mock rep. Eventually, she threw the log away, and it landed with a loud thud, "Shoot! I'm going to be late if I don't hurry. But these candies are definitely coming with me."

Dawn grabbed the bag as she sprinted away from the crater. Calves bulged and thighs expanded whenever she took a step, though the teen was too busy thinking of what to do next with the candies to notice.

Maybe she could give some to Ash and her friends? Or maybe even to her Pokemon. Or, perhaps a few more for herself?

Whatever the case, Dawn was going to enjoy the rare candies to her heart's content!
131.title: 5 candies

choices: Only one person wants to try out the candies
1311.content:
Arriving at the mall, Dawn let out a deep breath and smiled with confidence. She'd opted to run instead of walking in order to test her new legs. The Pokemon coordinator was pleased to find out that not only had her stamina skyrocketed, but she was also faster than ever. Dawn had practically raced through the forest on her way to the mall.

"These beauties are amazing." She patted the pumped lumps on her legs with newfound affection.

There was a particular enjoyment to be found in the way her calves would bulge nicely. She liked how those firm balls of muscles would instantly become as hard as stone; not to mention how cut.

As Dawn walked through the front doors, she became quickly aware of the stares she was getting; both from the male and female populace. Of course, they couldn't be blamed for staring at the young, but obviously very muscular girl, whose clothes did little to conceal her bulk.

A pair of teens that she passed by couldn't pass up on the opportunity either. Despite thinking Dawn didn't notice, they turned to look at her legs, almost bending over as to see what was underneath her skirt.

"Damn, dude! Look at those legs!"

"Have you ever seen such a fine ass?"

Annoyance flared up within Dawn, mixed with indignation. Yes, the bluenette was aware she was currently quite the looker, but did they have to be so crass?

"What was that?" She gave them a glare, tensing her arms slightly.

The boys flinched at her tone. But what really scared them, however, were her muscular arms that suddenly came to life with sturdy muscle fibers. The lines in between individual muscle groups deepened as their definition was showcased. Hers were bigger than those of the perverts, which wasn't much of a surprise.

They both yelped, already running away, "Nothing!"

"Mhm, that's what I thought." Dawn said to herself; the satisfied smirk on her face nothing short of victorious.

She had to admit, it was fun seeing those guys run away with their tails between their legs. Not that Dawn was ever planning on hurting them, but at least that was as good as any proof that she was no longer someone to mess with.

The muscular coordinator continued her walk through the mall, keeping an eye out for Ash and the others. Truth be told, she had kind of forgotten where they were supposed to meet up. All that could be done for now was search.

Dawn absentmindedly reached down to the bag of candies at her side; they were still there. Despite still not knowing where they came from, or how they could have possibly made her grow to the size of a female bodybuilder, yet she couldn't find it in herself to look into it.

After all, what was the point? There were far more interesting things to do -- like using more candies. Dawn giggled at the thought of eating another, or feeding a candy to someone else. Ever since she'd eaten those first candies, Dawn was hooked on the sensation, and seemed to have found a new love for muscle.

Passing through the rather large mall, she came across several establishments that looked appropriate to visit, such as a clothing store and gym. The small exercise back in the forest wasn't very effective to gauge how strong she truly was, so perhaps it would be useful to enter the gym later. And Dawn was definitely going to look for new clothes. Because while she really loved her new look, the clothes she wore at the moment were tad too tight; especially around the chest. Her large bust and meaty pectorals were to blame.

Also, her skirt was showing a LOT of skin.

Dawn hummed happily as she turned around a corner. Regardless of the small list of downsides to being this size, it surprised her just how fast she got accustomed to her new, improved physique. No issues with her balance whatsoever!

Eventually, she finally came across Ash, who was sitting next to a small fountain. The teenage boy was dressed in loose pants and a blue shirt, though the red cap on his head was still the same as usual.

Dawn's eyes lit up as she called out to the Pokemon trainer, "Hey, Ash! There you are!"

"Oh, Dawn, you're -- huh?!" Ash's own eyes widened drastically as he took in her muscular figure. She almost giggled at the gobsmacked expression on her friend's face, "What happened to you?!"

"Oh my..."

It was then that Dawn became aware of the company she hadn't seen first, due to the woman being obscured by the fountain. Standing there, dressed in her usual dark but stylish outfit, was none other than her region's very own Pokemon champion; Cynthia.

Said woman was taller than both her and Ash, even when taking the recent growth spurt she'd gone through into account. Dawn couldn't see anything different about Cynthia. The expert trainer was still very pretty; long, blonde hair and a striking figure.

"Hello, Cynthia. Nice to see you again." Dawn greeted her as soon as she got closer.

Cynthia returned the gesture, "A pleasure to see you too, Dawn. But I feel like I should repeat Ash's question. I'll admit; I'm curious about this recent change as well."

"Yeah, because I know you weren't that, um, big when I last saw you." Ash nodded in agreement. He blinked once, seemingly thinking about how he said that, and quickly added, "Not that there's anything wrong with that! You look great."

"Thanks, Ash. Glad to see you approve." She smiled and did a quick flex. A chuckle escaped her lips when she saw them stare at her defined bicep, which popped up like a ripe orange, "And to answer your question; well, it's a short story, really."

Dawn quickly explained how the bag of candies had come out of nowhere, appearing in the forest while she'd been passing through, and the effect that the treats had on her body. Ash and Cynthia listened closely, sometimes asking a question like how she felt with the additional muscle mass.

They were surprised to hear how she actually loved it, but a part of her understood. After all, they didn't know what it was like to undergo such an amazing transformation. Dawn had never felt as good before as she had during the growth, and even now she secretly wanted to eat another candy; just to experience that pleasant feeling again.

"So yeah, that's basically it. One moment I'm eating a bunch of candies, and the next thing I know, all of these muscles just show up out of nowhere. Not that I have any complaints, of course."

Cynthia was impressed, "Now you've got me curious about those candies. It sounds as if someone wanted to get rid of them, or maybe something else."

"Oh! That reminds me; I was wondering what you're doing here today, Cynthia?" Dawn tapped a dainty finger on her chin, the thick muscles in her forearm bulging in the process, "Not that I'm not happy that you're here, but isn't there a tournament or something that you would be attending this week? I could have sworn I heard it on the radio two days ago."

"It's no problem. True, there was an event planned to promote the opening of a new Pokemon park in Eterna City, but we had to postpone it. A storm was approaching, and should be arriving later today." Cynthia shrugged her shoulders. The blonde-haired beauty crossed her arms beneath her ample chest, sounding not too bothered by the unforeseen hiccup, "With my schedule empty, I figured I could check up on our handsome future champion over here."

The rather blunt compliment caused Ash's cheeks to darken, and he scratched his cheek in embarrassment, "Ha, thanks. I've still got a long way to go though. My Pokemon and I need to toughen up first."

Dawn raised an eyebrow, watching the two with a wary eye. The way Cynthia looked at her friend... Well, to her it looked as if someone had a bit of a crush on a certain boy, judging by the look in the blonde's eyes.

"Anyway, Cynthia and I were catching up a bit. The others are here too, but we split up after a while, so I'm not sure where they are. Still I wonder what it's like to get buff so easily." Ash spoke up; obviously he was curious about the candies.

Dawn smiled, holding the bag in her hand, "There's still plenty left, if you want. How about you try it out yourself?"
1311.title: Inside the mall, her friends are waiting for her

choices: Cynthia grows as big as a professional male bodybuilder
The champion becomes incredibly powerful and big
13111.content:
"Sounds fun. I'm in!" Ash grinned, eyes brimming with excitement.

Cynthia was less enthusiastic, but nodded her agreement, "I wouldn't mind one. There is no harm in improving your body, and I'd be lying if I said it doesn't look fun."

"Great! I'm glad you guys think so." Dawn responded happily. The bluenette opened the bag, revealing dozens upon dozens of candies. Surprisingly enough, there seemed to be more than one might expect from a bag this size, "I took five myself, so an amount like that could get my body type. Oh, and not too much, okay?"

"That seems fair to me." Ash shrugged.

The teenage trainer reached out and took two candies, withdrawing them from the container. Cynthia did the same, though Dawn didn't see how many the older woman retrieved.

"So, we just eat them?" The sole male member asked.

She gave thumbs-up in response, "Yup! All you've got to do is eat them, and the rest will take care of itself."

"Maybe you should go first, Ash." Cynthia offered.

Ash gave no verbal response. Instead, he opened his mouth and threw both candies inside, munching on them for a few seconds before swallowing. The teen didn't have to wait long; similarly to Dawn's own experience, the transformation occurred shortly after.

His clothes began to get tighter around his expanding physique, which wasn't obvious at first, but became pretty noticeable fairly quickly. The sleeves of his jacket and shirt were pulled taught by the lumps of muscle that appeared out of nowhere. Ash's shoulders widened too, accompanied by the swelling of firm deltoids.

However, as the seconds passed by, it became abundantly clear that he was growing in different ways too. Ash let out a quiet moan as an inch or three were added to his height, causing the already straining shirt to tear slightly at the neckline, exposing his rapidly developing pecs. Further down below, the shirt was dragged upwards and thus his solid sixpack was exposed to the world; much to the girls' delight.

"Wow, this feels weird... but also good?" Ash groaned mid-growth.

Dawn knew the feeling. She watched closely as her friend's legs took on some serious mass. Ash's jeans were already a bit worn, but the threads were beginning to unravel right before her own eyes. Defined, smooth muscle poked through the tears, looking more like her own hard quadriceps, despite not being as big. Oh, well, that was only because he'd taken two candies unlike her, who'd taken five.

Cynthia whistled in appreciation, "This is getting sexi -- I mean, more interesting by the second."

The small slip-up caused Dawn to regard her suspiciously, but her attention was quickly refocused on Ash, who remained oblivious of the Pokemon champion's feelings.

The growth finally reached the point where clothes were tested for durability. Suffice to say, Ash was going to need a new shirt and jacket; his chest was getting broader and broader, similar to how the muscles on his back were turned into a tapestry of sinews. The teen's chest muscles were so solid, they looked like actual blocks.

"Ugh!" Ash grunted loudly, before instinctively flexing his upper body.

This proved to the final catalyst for the demise of his clothes, as the shirt and jacket almost exploded into tatters. At long last, Ash's defined biceps and triceps burst free, revealed in all of their vascular glory. The remaining leftovers of his jacket hung on solid shoulder muscles.

Luckily -- or not, according to Cynthia if Dawn's suspicions were true -- the remaining article of clothing managed to hold albeit barely. Ash's pants were torn in various locations, allowing the bulging muscle there to get some fresh air, but at least he wasn't completely nude. He'd definitely have trouble pulling up his socks with how his shredded calves were taking up so much space though.

The end result was the physique of an amateur bodybuilder. Ash's muscles were much bigger now, and he was definitely not lean anymore, but neither was he bigger than Dawn. However, it revealed something interesting about the candies.

They expanded someone's muscles and strength, but if the subject was already moderately fit or muscular, then the candy that person took would be more effective. Dawn herself had never been out of shape, but she couldn't say she'd been fit either.

Ash on the other hand traveled a lot, plus he had a lot of exercise. Therefore he needed only two candies to get to his current level of muscularity. Dawn stored that information away for later.

Ash let out a deep breath, "That was way more intense than I thought it would be. So, how do I look?"

"I'd say pretty good!" Dawn grinned, patting the boy's defined pectorals, "The added muscle definitely makes you look older and more handsome."

"You do realize that implies I wasn't any of those before I took the candies, right?" Ash deadpanned.

The two ladies chuckled at his expense, finding humor in the way he pouted and crossed his new muscular arms over an equally muscular chest. Still, she wasn't lying; he did look good with the additional mass.

"Anyway," He continued, "I think I'm going to need new clothes after this. Damn, and I liked that jacket..."

"Don't worry, Ash. There's a shop on the next level. How about we go together; my treat?" Cynthia proposed, before flashing a black and gold credit card, "Being a champion has a lot of benefits, such as a healthy paycheck and discounts."

"Sweet! Thank you so much." The sole male member of their group smiled. Ash blinked suddenly, "Wait, you haven't eaten your own candies yet."

"Oh? Does someone have a thing for muscular ladies?"

Dawn was also interested in hearing Ash's response, so she leaned in a bit closer. Naturally, this drew his attention, causing him to look at her ripped arms and legs. His eyes were locked onto the hard, strong muscles.

They then realized something else had grown as well, since both Cynthia and Dawn could see a very impressive tool twitch inside his pants.

"Well, I didn't expect that. Come to think of it, you did pay a lot of attention to those women when we visited that fighting-type Pokemon gym." Dawn hummed.

Ash's covered himself out of embarrassment, his face going red, "Don't stare!"

Kind of hard not to; Dawn had never seen anyone so... gifted. His bulge was large and hard to hide, seeing as those pants were a few sizes too small for the aspiring Pokemon trainer.

"If that gets you all excited, then you'll love what's coming next." Cynthia was met with two confused stares, prompting her to smile mischievously and reveal her hand.

Their jaws almost dropped when they saw the total amount of ten or so candies in her palm; more than even Dawn had eaten. Before they could say anything, the blonde-haired bombshell ate every single one of them, ready for her transformation.

Cynthia let out a deep guttural groan, almost doubling over in the process, and Dawn could see her veins practically pulsating while her muscles bulged.

There was no telling just how big Cynthia would get.
13111.title: Both Cynthia and Ash agree

Dawn bit into one of them and was shocked by the taste. It was good..... nothing too amazing.... but..... it was so addictive! She soon found herself eating more, and more, until soon the bag was half empty!

Her stomach made a growl as pain began to grip her body.

"Uuuoouugh.... I think I ate too many.... I.....I! UGH!"

Dawn's pupils shrunk as the light faded from her eyes for a moment, her standing frozen in the woods. Slowly, her heartbeat began to beat faster and faster, veins beginning to appear on her skin. She shuddered for a few seconds, until finally......

BOOM

Her clothes didn't stand a chance, as they exploded into confetti as hundreds of pounds of muscle piled onto her body, the ground sinking cracking giving way beneath her feet. Her head was swallowed up by chest sized pecs and traps that went up to her ears. Her arms raised up into the air forcibly as her lats exploded with muscle, making her torso alone 5 feet thick. Each arm bloated and swelled with sheer size and muscle, looking as if two beach balls were stuffed underneath her skin.

Her lower body was also benefitting from the sudden growth, with her once slender thighs looking more like monumental roman colosseum pillars, with a wrecking ball butt to boot. Each calf bloated and swelled, looking less like the slender teardrop shape that they once had, and now looking more like a car tire of flesh.

Dawn snapped out of her trance, and clutched her head. "Ugh, what happened there.... I...... Wha?!" She could only see 3 quarters of her peripheral vision, the rest being blocked off by mounts of powerful flesh. Her once slender arm was now replaced by a gargantuan, throbbing, 300 pound arm!

Her eyes widened even more so as she tried to cup her monumental breasts, the jugs smashing into each other with each movement they made. They were even more threatening looking given how 2 feet of pectoral muscle backed them up.

Finger thick veins wrapped around her entire body, pulsating eerily.... but almost hypnotically too...

Dawn's face slowly turned into a crazy grin, all of this info almost too much to take.

"I'm.... I'm..... I'm so big! I'm like.... a goddess!"

............

"Yeah...... a goddess of muscle! Now then..... What should this goddess of muscle do?!"

1332.content:
Dawn gave another wide grin as she grabbed the bag of rare candies and headed for the mall. She was gonna show off her new body to everybody, and show how POWERFUL she had become!

Unbeknownst to the blue haired woman, the overdose on rare candies had triggered something inside of her. While these rare candies had been modified so that they worked on humans, in the end, they had still originally been made for pokemon to grow stronger. As a result, her mentality was slowly becoming more like that of a pokemon. She wouldn't lose all of her mind, but her IQ had definitely taken a hit, as well as her temper and sanity.

The bluenette continued to stomp towards the mall, her heaving, hulking body causing cracks in the pavements as her muscles and veins twitched irratically, fueled by the rare candies.

Most of the people in the mall had been having a peaceful time. However, the moment the doors were blasted aside, and a 1700 pound she hulk came charging in, chaos arose, with people panicking, some running away in horror, others looking in awe and arrousion from the ridiculously pumped up pokemon trainer, and some even fainting on sight.

Giovanni rubbed his chin and sat back down, staring intently at the purple haired man's face. "...... Go on....."

"Well, you see...... those rare candies she has. Whenever a pokemon eats them, they level up in a way. Essentially, a pokemon can become a certain rank, or level. Level 1 is the weakest, and level 100 is the strongest. When they level up, they become stronger physically, as well as whatever special powers they had."

Giovanni pondered this and nodded. "I see.... So you're saying that Jessie here has been leveling up her body using these rare candies?"

"Exactly sir. That's basically it. And when she hits level 100, she should be at her max."

"Excellent then! All we have to do is wait for her to get to level 100, then we stop her, right?"

"Erhm..... If only that were the case sir." Petrel rubbed the back of his neck and looked down, almost in a defeated way. "You see.... We measured her level a few minutes ago, and....."

".....And what......"

Petrel looked up with a grave look on his face. "She's only level 34 at the moment sir."

Giovanni's eyes widened in horror. "What?! Only a third of her maxed out strength? But she's gigantic! How is that possible?!"

Petrel shrugged and scratched the back of his head. "I dunno, but we have a plan.... Hopefully it'll work, but if it does, I don't know what will happen to Team Rocket.... I need your go for the plan."

Petrel spoke in a hushed tone as he explained it to him. Giovanni's eyes widened at the explanation.

"Well then...... Guess I'll have to decide whether we'll use our secret weapon or not........"

(Last half came from FMG-Queen, great writer, wanted to continue the idea on this bit too)
15321222.title: MOAR RARE CANDIES FOR JESSIE!

info.brief_description: A special batch of Rare Candies has been unleashed...
info.description:
RULES:
-GTS is allowed to an extent, but keep it mostly FMG & BE
-Guys can grow, but the girls have to grow first
-No killing off anyone
-Sex is allowed, but no underage sex (i.e. anyone younger than Ash & co.)
